languages.text: "Дай черни палец — она откусит руку, Лорд-капитан. Простолюдины понимают только язык силы и любые уступки воспримут как признак слабости. Нельзя давать им оружие и отзывать блюстителей, иначе мятеж на корабле — это только вопрос времени!"

"Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"
languages.original_text: "Дай черни палец — она откусит руку, Лорд-капитан. Простолюдины понимают только язык силы и любые уступки воспримут как признак слабости. Нельзя давать им оружие и отзывать блюстителей, иначе мятеж на корабле — это только вопрос времени!"

Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

"Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

languages.text: "Gebt dem Gesindel einen Grox und sie nehmen sich eine Agrarwelt, Lord Captain. Diese Leute verstehen nur brutale Gewalt und deuten jedes Zugeständnis als Zeichen von Schwäche. Ihnen Waffen zu geben und die Enforcer abzuziehen, wäre verrückt. Es wäre nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis eine umfassende Meuterei ausbricht!"
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Gebt dem Gesindel einen Grox und sie nehmen sich eine Agrarwelt, Lord Captain. Diese Leute verstehen nur brutale Gewalt und deuten jedes Zugeständnis als Zeichen von Schwäche. Ihnen Waffen zu geben und die Enforcer abzuziehen, wäre verrückt. Es wäre nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis eine umfassende Meuterei ausbricht!"

languages.text: « Donnez un grox aux va-nu-pieds et ils vous prendront un agri-monde tout entier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le seul langage qu'ils comprennent, c'est celui de la force brute, et la moindre concession sera interprétée comme un aveu de faiblesse. Leur donner des armes et rappeler les prévôts serait pure folie. Nous nous retrouverions rapidement avec une mutinerie généralisée sur les bras ! »
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

traits.locale_text: « Donnez un grox aux va-nu-pieds et ils vous prendront un agri-monde tout entier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le seul langage qu'ils comprennent, c'est celui de la force brute, et la moindre concession sera interprétée comme un aveu de faiblesse. Leur donner des armes et rappeler les prévôts serait pure folie. Nous nous retrouverions rapidement avec une mutinerie généralisée sur les bras ! »

languages.text: «Si le da un grox a esta chusma, se quedan el mundo agrícola entero, Lord Capitán. Solo entienden la fuerza bruta y considerarán cualquier concesión una muestra de debilidad. Darles armas y retirar al personal de seguridad sería una insensatez. ¡Tendríamos un motín completo al cabo de un tiempo!».
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

traits.locale_text: «Si le da un grox a esta chusma, se quedan el mundo agrícola entero, Lord Capitán. Solo entienden la fuerza bruta y considerarán cualquier concesión una muestra de debilidad. Darles armas y retirar al personal de seguridad sería una insensatez. ¡Tendríamos un motín completo al cabo de un tiempo!».

languages.text: 「暴徒に蜥蜴牛を与えれば、連中は農業惑星を手に入れることでしょう、ロード・キャプテン。彼らが理解するのは暴力の身であり、あらゆる譲歩を弱さの表れとして解釈します。彼らに武器を与えてエンフォーサーを呼び戻すのは愚の骨頂です。本格的な反乱が起きるのも時間の問題です！」
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒に蜥蜴牛を与えれば、連中は農業惑星を手に入れることでしょう、ロード・キャプテン。彼らが理解するのは暴力の身であり、あらゆる譲歩を弱さの表れとして解釈します。彼らに武器を与えてエンフォーサーを呼び戻すのは愚の骨頂です。本格的な反乱が起きるのも時間の問題です！」

languages.text: “只要给那群暴民一头格洛克斯兽，他们就会想占领整个农业世界，舰长大人。他们只懂得暴力，任何让步在他们看来都不过是软弱而已。如果给他们武器，召回执法者，那会是可怕的愚行。到时候恐怕用不了多久，叛乱就会彻底爆发！”
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"

traits.locale_text: “只要给那群暴民一头格洛克斯兽，他们就会想占领整个农业世界，舰长大人。他们只懂得暴力，任何让步在他们看来都不过是软弱而已。如果给他们武器，召回执法者，那会是可怕的愚行。到时候恐怕用不了多久，叛乱就会彻底爆发！”

languages.text: "Ayaktakımına bir groks verin, zirai dünyanın tekini ele geçirirler Lord Kaptan. Yalnızca kaba kuvvetten anlar ve tavizin emaresini bile görseler zayıflık olarak yorumlarlar. Ellerine silah verip onları infazcı ilan etmek çılgınlık olur. Büyük ölçekli bir isyanın başımıza bela olması artık an meselesi olur!"
languages.original_text: "Give the rabble a grox, and they will take an agri-world, Lord Captain. They only understand brute force and will interpret any concession as a sign of weakness. Giving them weapons and recalling the enforcers would be folly. It would only be a matter of time before we had a full-scale mutiny on our hands!"
